record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="link" and term="Link lines" and format.name="link.line" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: link
record.format.name: link.line

brief.brief: Contains the details of an individual link line.
All information on this form is temporarily stored in a structure in the link table for ease of maintenance.
Adds, updates, and deletes mentioned here refer to the arrays, not the link record itself.

detail.detail: F1 (Add Line): Takes the information entered and transfers it to the appropriate arrays. Service Manager only displays this key when you enter this screen using the F5 (New Line) key from the link screen. It disappears after you add the line.
F2 (Update Line): Takes the information entered and transfers it to the appropriate arrays. Service Manager cannot display this key at the same time as the F1 key.
F3 (End): Returns you to the link screen.
F4 (Delete Line): Deletes the element in the appropriate arrays. Service Manager cannot display this key at the same time as the F1 key.
F10 (Next Line): Takes you to the next link line. Service Manager only displays this key when it does not display the F1 key and it does display multiple link lines.
F11 (Prev Line): Takes you to the prior link line. Service Manager only displays this key when it displays the F10 key.
F12 (Menu): Exits the link maintenance utility.
